scripts.test:dev:clean: npm run clean:allure && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx playwright test || echo 'Test run has failures. Check the report for details.'
scripts.allure:generate: npm run allure:copy:history && npx allure generate allure-results --clean
scripts.test:dev:allure: npm run pretest && npm-run-all --continue-on-error -s test:dev:clean allure:generate
scripts.test:dev:allure:open: npm run pretest && npm-run-all --continue-on-error -s test:dev:clean allure:generate allure:open
scripts.test:prod:clean: npm run clean:allure && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npx playwright test || echo 'Test run has failures. Check the report for details.'
scripts.test:prod:allure: npm run pretest && npm-run-all --continue-on-error -s test:prod:clean allure:generate
scripts.test:prod:allure:open: npm run pretest && npm-run-all --continue-on-error -s test:prod:clean allure:generate allure:open
